segments.text: I watch the woman drying her dishes, seemingly indifferent to the world around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense, and it’s almost mesmerizing to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I catch sight of the water pouring over the sink, and my heart sinks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if she’s in a bubble, unaware of the chaos building behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I glance at the boy, straining to stretch for the cookie jar, and I feel a rush of anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? What if he gets hurt?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl beside him is so hopeful, and it pulls at my heartstrings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there’s also a gnawing sense of danger in this seemingly idyllic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can they both be so carefree in the face of such obvious hazards?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: As the water continues to overflow, I feel an urgency to say something.
segments.speaker: PAR
